main.bio: Hi there! I am Sonny! I am a detailed oriented accomplished technical frontend lead, with more than 5 years of experience, as well as proven track record of managing several tasks and large projects on time, working mostly in front-end technologies (React/Redux, and vanilla JS). I enjoy coding for the fun of it, but getting paid to code is even better. I spend my down-time working on various side-projects and contributing to open source. I am highly collaborative person who can work well in groups as well as on my own. I am good in time management as well as in team management which I believe, important aspects to deliver the project successfully.

education.school: Jaypee University of Information and Technology

work.title: Technical Frontend Lead
work.description: Responsible for managing the team and provide technical solutions for the product

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Responsible for developing the specific frontend part of the product

work.title: System Software Engineer
work.description: Responsible for migrating the banking application build using JSP servelets to ReactJs

testimonials.text: I've worked with Sahil in many projects. He is the most profound person who comes with variety of skill sets and his ability to tackle any problem is remarkable. Looking at his expertise, his work style is very unique and he is easily adjustable to a given situation.

I have worked with Sahil at Sendinblue, his work ethics are pristine, and he is easily adjustable to a given situation. His ability to go out of his way to help others has made him stand out. His knowledge of React ecosystem is great, learned a lot of the latest stuff while working with him. He managed projects like Micro-frontend, Design System, react-boilerplate which made developers' life easy. Thanks a lot for your continuous guidance!
